actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the amount which may be expensed with respect to certain depreciable business assets.

summary.text: Small Business Enhancement Act of 1996 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the dollar limitation on the cost of property which may be expensed by businesses as depreciable assets.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the amount which may be expensed with respect to certain depreciable business assets.
